scripts.copy-env: if test -f '.env'; then (cp .env client/) && (cp .env data/); else echo 'no .env file found; assuming you have set REACT_APP_MAPBOX_TOKEN'; fi
scripts.start-samples: concurrently "(cd server && npm start)" "(cd client && npm start)"
scripts.start: npm run copy-env && npm run start-samples
scripts.postinstall: concurrently "(cd server && npm install)" "(cd ./client && npm install)" "(cd ./data && npm install)"
scripts.upload-data: npm run copy-env && (cd data && npm run upload-data)
